entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -17.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -17.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
